import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { useRef } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { AccountContext } from "../Context/AccountProvider"; import { AuthContext } from "../Context/AuthProvider"; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' function FormPost() { const { register, formState: { errors }, handleSubmit } = useForm() const useSubmitData = (data) => { alert(JSON.stringify(data)) } return ( <>
errors
) } export default FormPost
